title: Truths About Prayer
itunes:author: Guest: Jodie Berndt
itunes:summary:
Even if your child is doing well, it's still important to pray for him or her. But what about when you don't feel like praying? John and Danny explain the importance of making prayer a regular habit in your parenting. Featuring Jodie Berndt.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Jodie Berndt's book "Praying the Scriptures for your Children" for your donation of any amount:
https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-17?refcd=1450701

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/truths-about-prayer/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/praying-scripture-over-your-child-s-life-digital/?refcd=1450701

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
